response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Our product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and unparalleled quality. Given its exceptional worth to you, I am confident it will serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors.

I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial saving compared to the market value of $1,500,000, while ensuring a fair return on my end.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a highly competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
